snippet.title: Pillow of Stone -- Developer Playthrough
snippet.description:
Pillow of Stone is an experiential music medley game about a man who escapes prison to give his daughter a teddy bear.

The idea behind this game was to try to craft an entire narrative using mostly only visuals and songs. It's an experiment in storytelling and interactive, emotional narrative.

You can download the full game for free here: https://johnvanderhoef.itch.io/pillow-of-stone
